reflex.name: Reflex level
reflex.desc: Basic reactions to external stimuli or commands (up to 3 triggers)

program.name: Programmable level
program.desc: Expanded reactions to external stimuli or commands (up to 9 triggers)

categorical.name: Categorical level
categorical.desc: Ability to freely interpret external conditions and perform actions by categories

situational.name: Situational level
situational.desc: Ability to freely interpret external conditions and perform actions based on the situation

contextual.name: Contextual level
contextual.desc: Context analysis and adaptation of actions based on the environment

analytical.name: Pseudo-analytical level
analytical.desc: Pseudo-intelligence capable of analysis and modifying data representation

emotional.name: Emotional level
emotional.desc: Ability to interpret and simulate emotional states

social.name: Social level
social.desc: Ability to adapt to social interactions and learn from others

integrative.name: Integrative level
integrative.desc: Ability to integrate into complex systems and coordinate actions (Cluster pseudo-intelligence management)

developing.name: Self-developing level
developing.desc: Full autonomy in learning and self-improvement

awawre.name: Self-aware AI
awawre.desc: Awareness of its own essence and goals
